column4: U.S. security panel approves Oceanwide purchase of Genworth
column5: WASHINGTON A U.S. panel that reviews foreign investments for potential national security threats has approved China Oceanwide Holdings Group's [OWREAC.UL] purchase of insurer Genworth Financial   the two companies said on Saturday.

column4: UPDATE 1-U.S. security panel approves Oceanwide purchase of Genworth
column5: WASHINGTON  June 9 A U.S. panel that reviews foreign investments for potential national security threats has approved China Oceanwide Holdings Group's purchase of insurer Genworth Financial  the two companies said on Saturday.
